features: ▶[Practical Design]Small(10.6x7.4x2.4inch), Strong , Sturdy, Compact but has lots and lost of zippers and compartments, ideal for keeping things organized (guaranteed your airline won't take it as a third carry-on item).your iPhone , Airpods with case, 3' charging cable with PD adapter, small Pebble Power pack, pocket Kleenex pack, sunglasses with case, wallet with lots of cards and some cash etc.

▶[ Versatility] Another wonderful feature about this cross-body bag is its versatility and the various ways it can be worn. The strap can be easily adapted to the right size and can be hooked left or right depending on your needs. This bag is great for every day use or travel.

▶[High quality fabrics] it has almost the perfect look.it is water repellent (rubberlike) on the outer parts and has mesh where it rests against the body, so it won’t be sticky or hot. The leatherlike type material is smooth and wipes clean.

▶[For Every Situation] Made with minimalists in mind. if you are tired of lugging around heavy purses that have everything you could possibly ever need in any situation for you and your entire family. your arms and hands will be free. you can take it to your son’s soccer game, out to ice cream, grocery shopping, and to church. you can use it as your regular purse .

▶ [Product Quality] The product has a one-year quality service period.We are committed to quality and inspection, but if there are any defects or flaws during the transportation and use of the product, please contact us immediately by email.

manufacturerProductDescription.media_text: Our shop include Laptop bags, casual backpacks, daypacks, travel bags, outdoor bags, messenger bags, waist packs and so on. The design style of OUR PRODUCT is business, casual and simple, but it can be used for commuting, travel, dating and parties. Our bags are upgraded to keep up with global fashion. And we develop our bags by studying the feedback data received from our customers. Product Quality:We are committed to quality and inspection, but if there are any defects or flaws during the transportation and use of the product, please immediately email to us.

Versatile Small Sling Bag For Men This crossbody bag is perfect for both men and women, and is ideal for those who want a hands-free carry option. The adjustable strap ensures a comfortable fit, whether you choose to wear it as a chest bag or sling backpack. The durable yet lightweight material makes it easy to carry all day long, while the sleek design complements any style.
YKK ziper Double zipper design, using ykk zipper, durable and smooth
You can customize your carry options to suit your needs. crossbody bag for men Sling backpack Mens chest bag

Get experience the convenience of a hands-free carry option! This mens crossbody bag is the perfect balance between functional and stylish.The small size makes it ideal for those who prefer a minimalist approach, while the multiple pockets allow for easy organization. The sleek look and durable material make this the perfect accessory for any outfit. Whether you use it as a small sling bag for men or women, or a crossbody bag for men, our sling bag is the perfect choice for those who want versatility and style.

reviews.reviewTitle: 5.0 out of 5 stars Cute and functional
reviews.reviewText: Looks great, holds plenty, just a tad hot when wearing like normal backpack, wished zippers open on side but it’s more of personal preference

reviews.reviewDate: Reviewed in the United States on August 30, 2023
Reviewed in the United States on October 14, 2023
Reviewed in the United States on January 11, 2023
reviews.reviewTitle: 5.0 out of 5 stars Husband loves it
reviews.reviewText: Purchased this for my husband and he loved it. Looks very sleek and has lots of room but not super huge and bulky like some backpacks. He can fit his phone, car keys and wallet comfortably. Great for everyday or travel.

reviews.reviewDate: Reviewed in the United States on May 26, 2023
reviews.reviewText: This is a small sling bag with 3 pocket. Seems to be well-made, perfect for my daily use. Main pocket is spacious enough to hold all of my daily needs without looking/feeling over-full. The main pocket zippers can be opened in either direction and for extra security (with a small padlock, not included) can be easily secured to the attached ring that connects the shoulder strap. The adjustable shoulder strap is generous in length and will fit most bodies. (I’m 6’ and wear XL shirts.) My iPhone fits spaciously in the bag’s rear pocket. After purchasing several bags, this one seems to be “the one.”

reviews.reviewDate: Reviewed in the United States on September 23, 2023
reviews.reviewTitle: 5.0 out of 5 stars Great to carry small electronics for on the go needs.
reviews.reviewText: This bag is great for my Gameboy Advance and all the games I carry with it.

reviews.reviewDate: Reviewed in the United States on November 10, 2023
reviews.reviewTitle: 4.0 out of 5 stars Had an issue with the strap fastener
reviews.reviewText: The compartments are good and spacious but the strap fastener kept loosening up so I ended up sending it back to Amazon. Hopefully others won't have that issue because it's a pretty good bag
